A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nonspecific Spoilers: The movie tells you what it’s doing through Kylo Ren— burning up the past\, the old tropes and formula of the earlier films\, subverting mythology. You can hate that but it does do that effectively. To me\, Disney said with TFA\, “Hey look we can do Star Wars a la a retro mashup.” With TLJ\, it said\, “But we’re not going there.” And with Ep. 9\, “This is where we’re going.”
